product_name: Lowa Ticam GTX Hiking Boots - Men's
long_description: The Lowa Ticam GTX hiking boots feature a forward-flexing design that keeps you comfortable mile after mile, and stiff soles for comfort and support when carrying heavy loads. Waxed split leather and synthetic microfiber uppers are durable and flexible, offering lasting protection and comfort; rubber toe and heel caps protect uppers from abrasion. Gore-Tex(R) waterproof liners let feet breathe while protecting them from the elements, keeping them dry and comfortable. Moisture-wicking polyester linings and perforations inside cuff linings move moisture out, helping to reduce the chance of blisters. An asymmetric padded tongue, soft edging, recessed ankle cut and curved insert combine for tailored comfort across instep. Construction facilitates natural ankle flex without compromising stability, resulting in a more comfortable stride. Polyurethane midsoles offer outstanding cushioning for all-day wear; midsoles allow for normal pronation but reduce excess cushioning to enhance stability. Lowa Ticam GTX hiking boots feature nylon shanks for enhanced torsional rigidity to protect and support feet. Vibram Masai rubber outsoles feature aggressive lugs and self-cleaning tread for excellent downhill traction.
short_description: The Lowa Ticam GTX hiking boots feature a forward-flexing design that keeps you comfortable mile after mile, and stiff soles for comfort and support when carrying heavy loads.
